column.name: CUSTOMER_NUMBER
column.comment: Customer number

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: The timestamp the entry is effective (valid) from, to track history

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted.

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: EFFECTIVE_STATUS
column.comment: The status of the association at the present time. It can be set to ACTIVE or DEACT.

column.name: PERSONAL_DATA_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates if the customer’s personal data can be used to market products and services to that customer

column.name: STATE_RD
column.comment: The current status of the customer

column.name: REFERENCE_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates  if the customer can be used as a reference

column.name: STATE_DATE
column.comment: This is the date that the state changes

column.name: CUSTOMER_DATA_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates if customer data can be used to determine whether to send marketing information for similar services

column.name: PROSPECT_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates if the customer is a prospect for the service provider

column.name: SERVICE_CUSTOMER_INDICATOR
column.comment: Number used before official customer number is created in CCB

column.name: SECURITY_CUSTOMER_GROUP_STRING
column.comment: The security group code to associate a region selected for the customer

column.name: CREDIT_CHECK_RESULT_STATE_RD
column.comment: Status of performing credit check

column.name: ENCRYPTION_KEY
column.comment: Key used for encrypt online bills

column.name: USAGE_DATA_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates  if the customer has given consent for the call data to be used to help shape the telecommunications services to suit the needs of the market

column.name: RETENTION_PERIOD_RD
column.comment: The amount of time for which the Customer Care and Billing (CCB) system should retain the customer’s event records

column.name: PAYMENT_TERM_RD
column.comment: The number of days allowed for the customer to pay their bill

column.name: USER_PASSWORD
column.comment: A password specified by the customer

column.name: ASSOCIATED_CUSTOMER_NUMBER
column.comment: Customer number related with the current customer

column.name: CATEGORY_RD
column.comment: The customer category of the customer

column.name: CLASSIFICATION_RD
column.comment: The appropriate group to help classify the customer

column.name: DOCUMENT_LANGUAGE_RD
column.comment: The language preferred by the customer

column.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_RD
column.comment: The method by which the customer wants to pay their bill

column.name: USAGE_LIMIT_AMOUNT
column.comment: Monetary amount for the customer’s charge limit for this customer

column.name: RISK_CATEGORY_RD
column.comment: Risk level to assign to the customer

column.name: CREDIT_CHECK_RESULT_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates the credit worthiness of the customer

column.name: INVOICE_CURRENCY_RD
column.comment: The currency in which to display the invoice charges

column.name: MASKING_DIGITS_RD
column.comment: The number of digits in each phone number that the customer wants to appear on the bill. No Mask means all numbers are shown.

column.name: CUSTOMER_GROUP_RD
column.comment: The company with which the customer is associated

column.name: CUSTOMER_INTERNAL_REF_NUMBER
column.comment: An internal reference number for the customer

column.name: FIRST_ACTIVATION_DATE
column.comment: The date when the customer is activated for the first time

column.name: MATCH_CODE_ID
column.comment: The number used by SAP to manage customer accounts

column.name: SERVICE_INCEPTION_DATE
column.comment: The date the first product subscription for the customer becomes active

column.name: CYCLE_NAME
column.comment: The preferred bill cycle associated with the customer

column.name: REGION_RD
column.comment: The region where the current customer is located

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is  incremented on each update.  Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the  number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: EFFECTIVE_FLAG
column.comment: Flagging of entries according to EFFECTIVE_DATE maintained by source system (EFFONL). "N" (now) - currently valid entry, "P" (past) - entry that was valid some then in the past, "F" (future) - entity will be valid in the future.

column.name: LAST_ARCHIVING_DATE
column.comment: Date on which the customer data was last time archived

column.name: SUPPRESS_ARCHIVING_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates if customer data should be ever deleted

column.name: SERVICE_LEVEL_RD
column.comment: The service level associated with the customer

column.name: READ_ONLY
column.comment: Read_Only is a flag with N or Y.

column.name: VIP_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates if the customer is very important

column.name: ARCOR_CONTACT_NUMBER
column.comment: Arcor contact number

column.name: PROSPECT_NUMBER
column.comment: Number used before official customer number is created in CCB

column.name: INQUIRY_FILE_TYPE_RD
column.comment: Identifier of inquiry customer

column.name: INQUIRY_CUSTOMER_NUMBER
column.comment: Customer who won the current customer. It is only used before a contract is assigned.

column.name: POST_IDENT_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicator of customer identifier by post office

column.name: STORAGE_MASKING_DIGITS_RD
column.comment: Number of digits which is used for masking phone number on the bill

column.name: MARKETING_FAX_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicator of publishing marketing information via fax

column.name: MARKETING_PHONE_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicator of publishing marketing information via phone

column.name: MARKETING_COOP_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicator of publishing customer data on cooperation level

column.name: MARKETING_AUTHORIZATION_DATE
column.comment: Date since then the customer information could be published to marketing
